text: People, idk why but i created a new language for my website, and English still show itself as Primary lenguage
BUT spanish is <http://website.com|website.com> and now english is <http://website.com/en|website.com/en>
And I want just the opposite... How can i fix this?
The language slug is automatically set by the page's language. It does not display if your page's language is the same as the domain's default language.
I just saw this message, how can i fix this?

now i am trying to edit the domain language as here

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/domains-and-urls/edit-a-domain-s-language-setting>

but it seems like i cannot change it
